Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results

Quote.Author: Albert Einstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Never, never, never give up

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going through hell, keep going

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life

Quote.Author: Winston Churchill
Quote.QuoteValue: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Well done is better than well said

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: When in doubt, don't

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship

Quote.Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: As you think, so shall you become

Quote.Author: Bruce Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Obey the principles without being bound by them

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is an infinite sphere of which the center is everywhere and the circumference nowhere

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: Kind words do not cost much. Yet they accomplish much

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: The least movement is of importance to all nature. The entire ocean is affected by a pebble

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: We sail within a vast sphere, ever drifting in uncertainty, driven from end to end

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary

Quote.Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy is the serious business of Heaven

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: We must show our Christian colors if we are to be true to Jesus Christ

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: An explanation of cause is not a justification by reason

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Reason is the natural order of truth; but imagination is the organ of meaning

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get a cup of tea big enough or a book long enough to suit me

Quote.Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: We are what we believe we are

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: A loving heart is the truest wisdom

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a melancholy truth that even great men have their poor relations

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: I only ask to be free. The butterflies are free

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing so strong or safe in an emergency of life as the simple truth

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: We forge the chains we wear in life

Quote.Author: Charles Dickens
Quote.QuoteValue: There are only two styles of portrait painting; the serious and the smirk

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleep is the best meditation

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion

Quote.Author: Dalai Lama
Quote.QuoteValue: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: Our fatigue is often caused not by work, but by worry, frustration and resentment

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: When fate hands you a lemon, make lemonade

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: The royal road to a man's heart is to talk to him about the things he treasures most

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed

Quote.Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to gather honey, don't kick over the beehive

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a question of whether we're going to go forward into the future, or past to the back

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a very good historical book about history

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's wonderful to be here in the great state of Chicago

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: The future will be better tomorrow

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't succeed we run the risk of failure

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: What you guys want, I'm for

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: For NASA, space is still a high priority

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't help but be impressed by the magnitude of the earthquake

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: This election is about who's going to be the next President of the United States!

Quote.Author: Dan Quayle
Quote.QuoteValue: In George Bush you get experience, and with me you get - The Future!

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty awakens the soul to act

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: I wept not, so to stone within I grew

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Pride, envy, avarice - these are the sparks have set on fire the hearts of all men

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: A mighty flame followeth a tiny spark

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: The sad souls of those who lived without blame and without praise

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: The more perfect a thing is, the more susceptible to good and bad treatment it is

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your own star!

Quote.Author: Dante Alighieri
Quote.QuoteValue: The customs and fashions of men change like leaves on the bough, some of which go and others come

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know where I'm going from here, but I promise it won't be boring

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a prophet or a stone aged man, just a mortal with potential of a superman. I'm living on

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see any boundaries between any of the art forms. I think they all inter-relate completely

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I always had a repulsive need to be something more than human

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame can take interesting men and thrust mediocrity upon them

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that I often bring out the best in somebody's talents

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I find only freedom in the realms of eccentricity

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you stumble across a few chords that put you in a reflective place

Quote.Author: David Bowie
Quote.QuoteValue: I went through all the musicians in my life who I admire as bright, intelligent, virtuosic players

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Always go with your passions. Never ask yourself if it's realistic or not

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to really educate ourselves in a way about who we are, what our real identity is

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: To think is to practice brain chemistry

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Mature workers are less impulsive, less reactive, more creative and more centered

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: The less you open your heart to others, the more your heart suffers

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Victims always feel alone and helpless

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: The fear of death comes from limited awareness

Quote.Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: I dislike the word 'self-help.' Self-awareness, yes, but not self-help

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: We inhabit a universe that is characterized by diversity

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: But God can only smile because only God can know what is coming next

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could shut up, but I can't, and I won't

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: My humanity is bound up in yours, for we can only be human together

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: Exclusion is never the way forward on our shared paths to freedom and justice

Quote.Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote.QuoteValue: Without forgiveness, there's no future

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: Storms make trees take deeper roots

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to flirt, and I've never met a man I didn't like

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an energy vampire. I just suck off everybody's energy. But I give it back

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: My songs are the door to every dream I've ever had and every success I've ever achieved

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: It costs a lot of money to look this cheap

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up around lots of men - my father, my brothers, my uncles - so I wasn't intimidated by them

Quote.Author: Dolly Parton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everyone should be with who they love

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to think anyway, so why not think big?

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I judge people based on their capability, honesty, and merit

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a great relationship with the Mexican people

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the Ernest Hemingway of 140 characters

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Without passion you don't have energy, with out energy you have nothing

Quote.Author: Donald Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always said, 'If you need Viagra, you're probably with the wrong girl.'

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I may not have gone where I intended to go, but I think I have ended up where I intended to be

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The knack of flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm spending a year dead for tax reasons

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: This must be Thursday. I never could get the hang of Thursdays

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I think fish is nice, but then I think that rain is wet, so who am I to judge?

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I seldom end up where I wanted to go, but almost always end up where I need to be

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: After ten years of word processing, I can't even do hand writing anymore

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: You live and learn. At any rate, you live

Quote.Author: Douglas Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile, it's free therapy

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: Drive slow and enjoy the scenery - drive fast and join the scenery

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can drive us crazy unless we give them the keys

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: Materialism is the only form of distraction from true bliss

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all serving a life sentence, and good behavior is our only hope for a pardon

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing old is not growing up

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: Boring people are a reflection of boring people

Quote.Author: Douglas Horton
Quote.QuoteValue: Action cures fear, inaction creates terror

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: You are remembered for the rules you break

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: Old soldiers never die; they just fade away

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not retreating - we are advancing in another direction

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: A better world shall emerge based on faith and understanding

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for victory

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no security on this earth; there is only opportunity

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: In war, you win or lose, live or die - and the difference is just an eyelash

Quote.Author: Douglas MacArthur
Quote.QuoteValue: A general is just as good or just as bad as the troops under his command make him

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Step with care and great tact, and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: I like nonsense; it wakes up the brain cells

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe Christmas, the Grinch thought, doesn't come from a store

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: You're never too old, too wacky, too wild, to pick up a book and read to a child

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not

Quote.Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote.QuoteValue: Only you can control your future

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it's the journey that teaches you a lot about your destination

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: A relationship can give you a gut wrenching feeling sometimes. It's a real emotional ride

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not confrontational, but if someone challenges, I'm not going to back down

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is mine to remember

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to knowing what to say, to charm, I always had it

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm mischievous, but I'm calculated

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: Kanye West is my favorite artist

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather tell you how I really feel

Quote.Author: Drake
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important for me to let my fans know I really don't care. I'm confident

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: A people that values its privileges above its principles soon loses both

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't lead by hitting people over the head - that's assault, not leadership

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace and justice are two sides of the same coin

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: When you put on a uniform, there are certain inhibitions that you accept

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: Plans are nothing; planning is everything

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: Pessimism never won any battle

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people wanted champagne and caviar when they should have had beer and hot dogs

Quote.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote.QuoteValue: Any man who wants to be president is either an egomaniac or crazy

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: God always strives together with those who strive

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's quick to blame the alien

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the gods only death does not desire gifts

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no sickness worse for me than words that to be kind must lie

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how men in exile feed on dreams

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: To be free from evil thoughts is God's best gift

Quote.Author: Aeschylus
Quote.QuoteValue: For know that no one is free, except Zeus

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: I owe my solitude to other people

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Saints need sinners

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is only a Rorschach ink-blot, you know

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: But at any rate, the point is that God is what nobody admits to being, and everybody really is

Quote.Author: Alan Watts
Quote.QuoteValue: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who lack the courage will always find a philosophy to justify it

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: A man without ethics is a wild beast loosed upon this world

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: To be happy we must not be too concerned with others

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear

Quote.Author: Albert Camus
Quote.QuoteValue: At any street corner the feeling of absurdity can strike any man in the face

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: There are things known and there are things unknown, and in between are the doors of perception

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored
